members.name: getRingtone
members.description: Get the ringtone list of the device

members.name: playRingtone
members.description: This function starts playing the ringtone

params.name: ringtoneUri
params.description: The path to the ringtone file

members.name: stopRingtone
members.description: This function stops playing the ringtone

params.name: ringtoneUri
params.description: The path to the ringtone file
